page.title: 10Notable Events in New Mills
page.content: New Mills is very good for events such as the carnivals and galas. Every year all the schools have their sports up at the New Mills Sports Ground. We compete with each other in flat races and obstacle races. The carnival is to raise money for the swimming pool. This year the New Mills Football Club organised a gala up on the football ground. It had a B.M.X. competition, a 5-a-side football match competition and a sports day with water races and obstacle races for the New Mills children.
